title: Incongruous: Prologue
description: I would say that disease, death and stupidity don't forgive. What would you do to save yourself from one of these three things? But from all three? And what would you do to save your loved one from disease, both from death and you from stupidity? It is about how the world looks like when love insists, stupidity overthrows but yet disease and death don't forgive this thing...
author: Aloman Victor Nicolae
